about_the_game:
MORGANICA

Morganica is a city in the Otherworld created by Demons of Evil to satisfy their endless thirst for human meat and fear.

This creepy, gloomy city is inhabited by monsters, zombies and insiders: people abducted from the real world, who somehow adapted to life in a new world.

For years, Demons have been forcing insiders to fight each other in a wild Bloody Harvest ritual to feed the remains of the dead to a creepy monster - Corpse-Eater. And from him, in turn, the Demons receive food for their physical bodies.

But one day, a hero appeared in Morganica, who made a revolution and changed the old way. You can learn more about these events in the second part of our series, which will be a single-player adventure. These changes also led to the fact that participation in the Bloody Harvest became voluntary. Now insiders are fighting for adrenaline, fame and of course for freedom from the power of Demons.

The player will become one of ten furious fighters who will take part in this battle. When developing the idea and concept, we were inspired by the legendary Quake 3 Arena.

In Morganica you will find:

-Unique character customization system. Add new organs: hands, legs, eyes, etc. to expand your character's combat capabilities!

- Wide range of weapons: from classic shotguns and pistols to devastating plasma guns! Choose your fighting style and your favorite gun!

- Summoning an assistant. Is it getting hot? Can't cope with the onslaught of enemies? If you have a special Ice artifact, you can summon a zombie assistant to help with ammunition, first-aid kits, or combat artifacts!

- In-game marketplace where you can sell and buy weapons, artifacts, skins, and even body parts!

Become the champion of the harsh Bloody Harvest! Battle trophies, eternal glory and a lot of adrenaline are waiting for you!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game has scenes of violence, blood and a demonstration of human entrails. Some characters use profanity.
There is no demonstration of alcohol, smoking and drugs, but it is obvious that some characters abuse it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GF 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: Any Open XR
  • Additional Notes: Two possible game modes - PC or VR.
